description: VMware vSphere Dashboard - Hosts (Grafana 9.x / InfluxDB v2.0)

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_sys")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime_latest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usagemhz_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_average" or r["_field"] == "totalCapacity_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: float(v: r.usage_average) * float(v: r.totalCapacity_average) / 100.00 * 1024.00 }))
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "instance-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: CPU usage as a percentage during the interval.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.description: Time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU during last measurement interval.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ready_summation")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["esxhostname"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: CPU Ready in miliseconds

panels.description: Network utilization (combined transmit-rates and receive-rates) during the interval.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytesRx_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field","interface"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_net")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "bytesTx_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Network Usage

panels.description: The average time a read, or write, from the virtual disk takes.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalReadLatency_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field","disk"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_disk")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "totalWriteLatency_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field","disk"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Total Disk Latency

panels.description: The average time a read, or write, from the datastore takes.

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_storageAdapter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numberReadAveraged_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_storageAdapter")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numberWriteAveraged_average")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["esxhostname"] =~ /${esxi:regex}/)
  |> group(columns: ["_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

panels.title: Storage Adapter IOPS

targets.query: SELECT last("totalCapacity_average") * (last("usage_average")) / 100 * 1024 FROM "vsphere_host_mem" WHERE ("esxhostname" =~ /^$esxi$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: CPU Ready in miliseconds

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_cpu")
  |> keep(columns: ["vcenter"])
  |> distinct(column: "vcenter")
  |> group()
list.label: vCenter Server
list.name: vcenter
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_host_cpu")
  |> keep(columns: ["vcenter"])
  |> distinct(column: "vcenter")
  |> group()

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "vsphere_cluster_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["vcenter"] == "${vcenter}")
  |> keep(columns: ["clustername"])
  |> distinct(column: "clustername")
  |> group()

list.name: clustername
